Please use only lowercase letters (a-z) and 4 characters or less!

MissionGraph-Validation-Succeed: The rule is successfully set and valid.
MissionGraph-Validation-LeftMoreThanRigh: The number of Source nodes can't be more than on the Replacement.
MissionGraph-Validation-EmptyLeft: The number of Source node can't be less than one.
MissionGraph-Validation-IsolatedNode: You can't have isolated nodes. Make sure all nodes are connected using connection.
MissionGraph-Validation-IsolatedConnecti: You can't have isolated connection. Make sure the start and end of all connections are connected to nodes.
MissionGraph-Validation-ExactlyDuplicate: The graphs on the Source and Replacement are isomorphic. Please change anything.
MissionGraph-Validation-MultipleRelation: Multiple connections between two nodes are not allowed.
MissionGraph-Validation-CyclicLink: The current graph potentially makes infinite loops. Please avoid cyclic link structure.
MissionGraph-Validation-OrphanNode: First-indexed node can't have parent node. The other nodes must at least have a parent node.
MissionGraph-Validation-OverflowedAnyNod: The ordering of 'Any' node on the Source and on the Replacement must be the same.
Index-About:
Dungeon Generation is a tool for procedurally generate a Game Level specifically for Dungeon. 
This tool concerns about the player progression by using Mission & Space framework originally established by Joris Dormans. 
Developed by NTUST GameLab, Taiwan, advised by Prof. Wen-Kai Tai. 
Copyright © 2017.
LevelSetting-Dialog-Content: Are you sure want to save these level settings?
